SENT.plain: A family with antithrombin III (AT III) deficiency is described
Four brothers or seven siblings show markedly reduced AT III levels (functional assay 39-47%, immunoassay 54-58%)
Three developed thromboses and pulmonary embolism at the ages of 11, 17 and 20 years respectively
Longterm oral anticoagulation therapy has been instituted in all four brothers
